title: The Ballad of Sir Dinadan
description: Though he would rather pursue his talent as a minstrel, eighteen-year-old Dinadan is forced to follow his older brother Tristram's path and become a knight, and while on a quest with Sir Kai and Sir Bedivere, he learns that honor is often found not in spectacular, heroic deeds of song, but in quite simpler ways. Reprint.
author: Gerald Morris
